boardgame.name: Sylla
boardgame.description: Sylla was the name of a Roman Consul and dictator; the name of the game is a reference to his person. The designer tried to bring together _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Res Publica Romana_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Saint Petersburg,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; furthermore playable in one hour._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The players will try to become the premier Consul of Rome. Each of the five years (turns) is subdivided into seven phases in which the players take their actions. It will be semi-cooperative as one player alone cannot influence all parts of the Roman social or political life. They also have to prepare for negative events like epidemic plague or persecution of the Christians and also decadence._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Ystari games website has downloadable rules for the game for 2 players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: The Spiel #68 - That_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s A Wrap - 2008 Holiday Gift Guide

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

RIO Grande Games (RIO378) Game Description: The year is 79 BC. Sylla, the uncontested master of Rome, is preparing to abdicate. During his reign the Roman senate has rediscovered its glory and many are the pretenders to his supreme power. But Rome is a fickle mistress; the people are hungry and want for bread and circuses. Only the most cunning politicians can take advantage of the situation… Players take the role of Roman senators in their quest for glory. They use their fortunes and their connections to build great works and resolve the political problems of the Republic. At the end of the game the player with the most prestige wins and takes control of Rome. Author: Dominique Ehrhard

RIO Grande Games (RIO378) The year is 79 BC. Sylla, the uncontested master of Rome, is preparing to abdicate. During his reign the Roman senate has rediscovered its glory and many are the pretenders to his supreme power. But Rome is a fickle mistress; the people are hungry and want for bread and circuses. Only the most cunning politicians can take advantage of the situation... Players take the role of Roman senators in their quest for glory. They use their fortunes and their connections to build great works and resolve the political problems of the Republic. At the end of the game the player with the most prestige wins and takes control of Rome.

A game for 3-4 Players The players will try to become the premier Consul of Rome. Each of the five years (turns) is subdivided into seven phases in which the players take their actions. It will be semi-cooperative as one player alone cannot influence all parts of the Roman social or political life. They also have to prepare for negative events like epidemic plague or persecution of the Christians and also decadence. Includes: board; 60 cards; 40 tiles; 4 screens; 120 Res Publica tokens; 40 coins; 5 wooden discs; 40 wooden cubes; 1 rule; 1 player aid [includes one ‘uncensored’ extra card just for kicks] [[THE FORBIDDEN CARD]] 2008 Ystari games and Rio Grande Games New - NO PXG, Never played but tokens have been popped out (cards are sealed) Original Retail: $99
New in shrink
